title: Ticket #7293: Docstring for htcondor.Collector.query() lists wrong param name
description:
htcondor.Collector.query() has an argument named "projection" that is the list of attributes to use for the projection. In the documentation, this is correctly listed in the method header, but the details list it as "attrs". So correct: 

 query(ad_type=htcondor._htcondor.AdTypes.Any, constraint='', projection=[], statistics='') -> object :

and later on in the Parameters section, incorrect: 

 attrs (list[str]) – A list of attributes to use for the projection.
                     Only these attributes, plus a few server-managed,
                     are returned in each ClassAd.
check_ins: 2019-Oct-01 15:01   Check-in [57993]: (#7293) fix name of "projection" argument in Collector.query() (By JoshKarpel )
creator: matyas
